products.title: Ecowood, Porcelain Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood, porcelain grey fine grain - venetian blind the natural grain finish of the ecowood in porcelain grey fine grain makes it perfect for adding the look of authentic painted wood to your home. The silky grey tone is sweet and subtle, as well as compl
products.productdescription: The natural grain finish of the ecowood in porcelain grey fine grain makes it perfect for adding the look of authentic painted wood to your home. The silky grey tone is sweet and subtle, as well as completely versatile, matching a wide range of styles and colour schemes.Insert the porcelain grey fine grain into a light decor scheme for a lounge, furnishing the room with white painted wickers, luxe grey fabrics, and minimal metal. Going for a hushed and simple, yet comfy and luxurious, look is the ultimate in sophisticated flair.

products.title: Ecowood, Chic Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood, chic grey fine grain - venetian blind aptly named, the ecowood in chic grey fine grain is as chic as they come. A strong, sophisticated grey is featured on an authentically textured faux wood, formed into wide slats that can be easily adjusted to
products.productdescription: Aptly named, the ecowood in chic grey fine grain is as chic as they come. A strong, sophisticated grey is featured on an authentically textured faux wood, formed into wide slats that can be easily adjusted to suit your mood and needs.Grey and yellow is fast becoming a contemporary classic, but have you ever considered going for grey and lime? This funky colour scheme will give a modern kitchen a zesty lift, whilst also maintaining a feeling of stylish chic in your home.

products.title: Ecowood, Brilliant White Satin - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood, brilliant white satin - venetian blind with a timeless look and feel, brilliant white satin from their ever-popular ecowood range offers you a chance to breathe new life into any space. The crisp tone of the white shines through in the background -
products.productdescription: With a timeless look and feel, brilliant white satin from their ever-popular ecowood range offers you a chance to breathe new life into any space. The crisp tone of the white shines through in the background - adding the perfect finishing touch to the contemporary look you've carefully created.We love the idea of pairing brilliant white with crisp white fabrics and light stone grey scatter cushions in the master bedroom. That way you will be able to create the modern meets homely space you'll never want to leave.

products.title: Ecowood, Pistachio Shell Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood, pistachio shell fine grain - venetian blind in a gentle, creamy beige, the ecowood in pistachio shell fine grain offers a classic wood texture that adds to its feel of authenticity. The colour is subtle and understated, so it's easily matched, an
products.productdescription: In a gentle, creamy beige, the ecowood in pistachio shell fine grain offers a classic wood texture that adds to its feel of authenticity. The colour is subtle and understated, so it's easily matched, and the wide slats are strong and easy to use.Settle the pistachio shell fine grain against a deep plum purple for a strong and moody bedroom look. Hang the blind on a purple feature wall, painting the others cream or the palest of biscuits, and match bedding and accessories to the plum shade.

products.title: Ecowood, Washed White Satin - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood, washed white satin - venetian blind a subtly layered finish creates the standout look that we call washed white satin. The washed out white provides the ideal canvas for the gentle ebb and flow of the grain that comes through the closer you look.
products.productdescription: A subtly layered finish creates the standout look that we call washed white satin. The washed out white provides the ideal canvas for the gentle ebb and flow of the grain that comes through the closer you look.For a relaxing ambience that will have you drifting off to sleep in no time at all why not pair washed white with some gentle blue walls and a lightly coloured wooden floor? Ideal for taking you back to memories of the coast as you fall into the deepest sleep the moment your head hits the pillow.

products.title: Ecowood, Blizzard Grey Satin - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood, blizzard grey satin - venetian blind a soft and wintery shade, as its name suggests, the ecowood in blizzard grey satin is nothing if not cool, calm, and collected. Its subtle and unassuming tone means it's completely versatile and will work anyw
products.productdescription: A soft and wintery shade, as its name suggests, the ecowood in blizzard grey satin is nothing if not cool, calm, and collected. Its subtle and unassuming tone means it's completely versatile and will work anywhere in the home amidst any dcor scheme.Try the blizzard grey satin in an all-white dining room, using this soft grey as the only colour in the form of furniture, accessories, and of course, the blind. You'll love the modern look of the scheme, which will always feel clean and contemporary.

products.title: Ecowood, Absolute White Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood, absolute white fine grain - venetian blind with realistic woodgrain texturing for an authentic feel, the ecowood in absolute white fine grain displays an icy white tone and a matt finish. Alongside thick, sturdy slats, this blind features a match
products.productdescription: With realistic woodgrain texturing for an authentic feel, the ecowood in absolute white fine grain displays an icy white tone and a matt finish. Alongside thick, sturdy slats, this blind features a matching headrail, pelmet, and bottom rail for a classy, finished look.For a bright and breezy bathroom look, where the water-resistant absolute white fine grain will settle in perfectly, post the blind against clean aqua walls. Use a matching white for the remainder of the key features, and accent with aqua towels and oddments.

products.title: Ecowood, Chenille Satin - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood, chenille satin - venetian blind the ecowood's chenille satin is discreet and demure in a matt, creamy white finish. This authentic-looking faux wood is formed from high quality, hardwearing pvc, making it both sturdy, wipe-clean, and water-resist
products.productdescription: The ecowood's chenille satin is discreet and demure in a matt, creamy white finish. This authentic-looking faux wood is formed from high quality, hardwearing pvc, making it both sturdy, wipe-clean, and water-resistant - and therefore ideal for any family-centred room.Offset a duck egg colour scheme in a contemporary kitchen, setting the chenille satin amidst painted walls and cream or wooden units. Stick to lighter wood tones to maintain a light and spacious aesthetic, and accent with hints of silver for fixtures and fittings.

products.title: Ecowood, Penthouse Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood, penthouse fine grain - venetian blind the ecowood in penthouse fine grain offers a luxury, hushed cream tone that wouldn't look out of place in the chicest of homes. A textured surface gives the impression of a true wood grain, and this faux wood
products.productdescription: The ecowood in penthouse fine grain offers a luxury, hushed cream tone that wouldn't look out of place in the chicest of homes. A textured surface gives the impression of a true wood grain, and this faux wood offers all the strength and durability of wood as well.Settle the penthouse fine grain amongst rich chocolate browns and muted golds for a feeling of opulent luxury in the master bedroom. Include plush rugs and silky-feel bedlinen, opting for a dark feature wall for a striking focal point.

products.title: Ecowood, Brilliant White Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood, brilliant white fine grain - venetian blind brilliant white fine grain combines a calm and pure white with an intriguing texture which adds depth and subtly to any room in the house. As the light catches your eye you'll see how the textured lines
products.productdescription: Brilliant white fine grain combines a calm and pure white with an intriguing texture which adds depth and subtly to any room in the house. As the light catches your eye you'll see how the textured lines gently ebb and flow to give the piece a unique look and feel. Finding the perfect finishing touch for the spare bedroom can be difficult, so why not go in a different direction? The neutral colouring works in any setting, whilst the natural flow of the lines adds a calming presence that will have your guests drifting off to sleep in no time at all.

products.title: Ecowood, Castle Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood, castle grey fine grain - venetian blind a regal grey, as its name suggests, the ecowood in castle grey fine grain has a beautifully textured finish and the cool grey is clean and understated. Its wide slats are easily adjustable for versatility o
products.productdescription: A regal grey, as its name suggests, the ecowood in castle grey fine grain has a beautifully textured finish and the cool grey is clean and understated. Its wide slats are easily adjustable for versatility of light, air, and privacy, making it an ideal all-rounder.Enhance a stark white wall in a living room or dining room by adding the castle grey fine grain, along with other accessories in varying shades of grey. Choose a contrasting colour as an accent, such as a sunny yellow or zesty lime green, and use it for the occasional trinket or cushion.

products.title: Ecowood, Vanilla Kiss Satin - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood, vanilla kiss satin - venetian blind the smooth and silky finish of the ecowood in vanilla kiss satin makes for a lush and refreshing look. The delicate colour plus the durable functionality makes a winning combination, blending style and durabili
products.productdescription: The smooth and silky finish of the ecowood in vanilla kiss satin makes for a lush and refreshing look. The delicate colour plus the durable functionality makes a winning combination, blending style and durability with ease  which is what every modern home needs!Insert the vanilla kiss satin into a bright and breezy french-style kitchen, surrounding it with similar vanilla creams, soft whites, and palest pastels. Go for a look of luxe minimalism, adding elegant shapes to compliment the subtle simplicity of the blind.

products.title: Ecowood, Vanilla Kiss Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood, vanilla kiss fine grain - venetian blind the ecowood in vanilla kiss fine grain has all the charm of a painted blind, combined with the authentic feel of a real wood blind. Made from a realistic faux wood, this is a durable and hardwearing piece
products.productdescription: The ecowood in vanilla kiss fine grain has all the charm of a painted blind, combined with the authentic feel of a real wood blind. Made from a realistic faux wood, this is a durable and hardwearing piece that will stand the test of time  and the moistness of your bathroom!Use the vanilla kiss fine grain in the bathroom or kitchen along with an understated wood and cream colour scheme. Go for wood paneling or units, along with matching cream walls and accessories. This look has both class and style  what more could you need?

products.title: Ecowood, Chenille Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood, chenille fine grain - venetian blind the creamy, off-white chenille fine grain, from the hardwearing ecowood range, is light and relaxed, ensuring that it will match a range of decor schemes. This durable, pvc blind is quick and simple to install
products.productdescription: The creamy, off-white chenille fine grain, from the hardwearing ecowood range, is light and relaxed, ensuring that it will match a range of decor schemes. This durable, pvc blind is quick and simple to install, freeing up your time to sit and enjoy it.Enhance a daring, tropical purple feature wall in a teenager's bedroom by hanging the chenille fine grain against it, using glossy and glistening silvers as accents. Your child will be impressed with their new, funky bedroom look, and you can rest satisfied that you have installed a hardwearing, quality blind!

products.title: Ecowood, Absolute White Satin - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood, absolute white satin - venetian blind silky smooth, as its name suggests, the ecowood in absolute white satin has a beautifully untextured finish and the icy white is clean and refreshing. Wide slats form the main structure of this blind, easily
products.productdescription: Silky smooth, as its name suggests, the ecowood in absolute white satin has a beautifully untextured finish and the icy white is clean and refreshing. Wide slats form the main structure of this blind, easily adjustable for light, air, and privacy versatility.Enhance the pure, fresh white of the absolute white satin and pit it against an equally clean-toned mint green for a calming yet energising ambience in the kitchen. Opt for white units and tiling, painting the walls in green, and finish with shiny chrome fittings.

products.title: Ecowood, Castle Grey Satin - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood, castle grey satin - venetian blind the ecowood in castle grey satin offers a subtle grey shade with a silky satin finish. Made from high quality faux wood, designed to withstand moist conditions, this blind has the full package: style, durability
products.productdescription: The ecowood in castle grey satin offers a subtle grey shade with a silky satin finish. Made from high quality faux wood, designed to withstand moist conditions, this blind has the full package: style, durability, and functionality.Take advantage of the range's suitability to any environment and use it as part of a monochrome bathroom scheme. Go for black and white tiling, a white suite, and black and grey accessories. The sophisticated castle grey satin will fit in perfectly! Throw in the occasional splash of your favourite colour for added depth.

products.title: Ecowood, Pistachio Shell Satin - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood, pistachio shell satin - venetian blind the ecowood in pistachio shell satin displays a pale, creamy biscuit with a silky satin finish, on a strong and sturdy slatted blind. Built to withstand moist conditions, and easily adjustable, this blind of
products.productdescription: The ecowood in pistachio shell satin displays a pale, creamy biscuit with a silky satin finish, on a strong and sturdy slatted blind. Built to withstand moist conditions, and easily adjustable, this blind offers everything a window could need - and more!Use the pistachio shell satin to tone down a brightly coloured wall in a living room or bedroom. This creamy tone will match rich shades such as chocolate browns, plum purples, and burgundy reds. Accentuate with matching cream tones and the occasional splash of muted gold.

products.title: Ecowood, Penthouse Satin - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood, penthouse satin - venetian blind true to its name, the ecowood in penthouse satin offers the look and feel of true penthouse luxury. A soft, creamy caramel, with the smoothest of textures, it offers an understated style that is often so hard to a
products.productdescription: True to its name, the ecowood in penthouse satin offers the look and feel of true penthouse luxury. A soft, creamy caramel, with the smoothest of textures, it offers an understated style that is often so hard to achieve. Not anymore!Use the penthouse satin in a contemporary bedroom, where creams, coffees, and golds rule the roost. Add in plenty of plush fabrics to provide a feeling of luxe and comfort, using coffee browns and glistening golds as light accents around the room.

products.title: Ecowood, Chic Grey Satin - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood, chic grey satin - venetian blind the ecowood in chic grey satin is as bold as grey gets, and this dark hue offers an air of moody sophistication. With a polished feel, the slats offer clean lines and ease of use. They can be adjusted quickly and
products.productdescription: The ecowood in chic grey satin is as bold as grey gets, and this dark hue offers an air of moody sophistication. With a polished feel, the slats offer clean lines and ease of use. They can be adjusted quickly and simply to allow in more or less light as needed.Let the chic grey satin take centre stage against a white wall, and accent with a pale lemon yellow, making for the ideal colour scheme for a contemporary kitchen. Keep matching greys to a minimum, keeping the room light and airy with plenty of whites and yellows.

products.title: Ecowood, Blizzard Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood, blizzard grey fine grain - venetian blind reminiscent of a wintery storm, the ecowood blizzard grey fine grain takes a cool, icy toned grey that just screams laidback chic. The grainy texture of this faux wood looks and feels authentic, and there
products.productdescription: Reminiscent of a wintery storm, the ecowood blizzard grey fine grain takes a cool, icy toned grey that just screams laidback chic. The grainy texture of this faux wood looks and feels authentic, and there's the added bonus of moisture-resistance and strong durability.Team the blizzard grey fine grain with a monochrome colour scheme in a contemporary living room. Stick to pure white walls and add in furniture in varying tones of black and grey, throwing in some plush fabrics to counteract the hard lines and colours.

products.title: Ecowood, Country Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood, country fine grain - venetian blind convincingly textured to produce the look and feel of genuine wood, the ecowood in country fine grain is in fact formed from hardwearing pvc. This faux wood material has the added advantage of being water-resis
products.productdescription: Convincingly textured to produce the look and feel of genuine wood, the ecowood in country fine grain is in fact formed from hardwearing pvc. This faux wood material has the added advantage of being water-resistant, making it an ideal choice for a family bathroom or kitchen.Go all-out outdoorsy in your living room by partnering the country fine grain with forest and grass greens and natural, organic browns. Use plenty of wools, hessians, and wickers in the room and add the occasional potted plant to complete the look.

products.title: Ecowood, Chateau Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood, chateau fine grain - venetian blind in true french style, the ecowood in chateau fine grain has a demure, understated tone, making it ideal for homely, vintage feel. Matching rails and control cords provide complete colour coordination, so that y
products.productdescription: In true french style, the ecowood in chateau fine grain has a demure, understated tone, making it ideal for homely, vintage feel. Matching rails and control cords provide complete colour coordination, so that you can be sure that nothing will distract from this pretty, faux wood blind.Incorporate the chateau fine grain into a romantically styled bathroom, where the tiling is a creamy off-white and the walls are painted in pale vintage pink. Be sure to include vintage, shabby chic finds and opt for antiqued brass fittings.

products.title: Ecowood, Espresso Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood, espresso fine grain - venetian blind with all of the neat good looks of wood and functional practicality of a venetian, the ecowood in espresso fine grain displays a dark brown wood effect on hardwearing slats. This quality faux wood is water-res
products.productdescription: With all of the neat good looks of wood and functional practicality of a venetian, the ecowood in espresso fine grain displays a dark brown wood effect on hardwearing slats. This quality faux wood is water-resistant and won't crack or warp, making it ideal for bathrooms and kitchens.Influence your kitchen with a soft monochrome scheme, going for brown or soft black worktops similar to the espresso fine grain and creamy off-white units. Include funky retro prints and oddments in the room to inject a little personality.

products.title: Ecowood, Fruitwood Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood, fruitwood fine grain - venetian blind with a dark mahogany tone, and a grained finish, the ecowood in fruitwood fine grain has a truly authentic look and feel, belying its pvc material. This durable, long-lasting blind is water-resistant so you c
products.productdescription: With a dark mahogany tone, and a grained finish, the ecowood in fruitwood fine grain has a truly authentic look and feel, belying its pvc material. This durable, long-lasting blind is water-resistant so you can be sure that it won't warp or crack.Merge the fruitwood fine grain with duck egg blue walls in a traditionally styled living room. Incorporate polished wood furnishings and matching duck egg accessories, adding in a hint of teal for a quick burst of bold colouring.

products.title: Ecowood, Provincial Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood, provincial fine grain - venetian blind in a light, orange-toned wood effect, the ecowood in provincial fine grain has a warm and cosy finish, with natural-looking wood grain texturing to give a feeling of true authenticity. Matching accessories,
products.productdescription: In a light, orange-toned wood effect, the ecowood in provincial fine grain has a warm and cosy finish, with natural-looking wood grain texturing to give a feeling of true authenticity. Matching accessories, including a pelmet, bottom rail, and control cords, finish the look with ease.For a snug and homely ambience in the dining room, set the provincial fine grain against a mediterranean red, furnishing the room with matching woods in light and medium tones. Accessorise with shades of taupe to give the scheme an extra dimension.

products.title: Ecowood, Porcelain Grey Satin - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood, porcelain grey satin - venetian blind the ecowood in porcelain grey satin is a pretty yet unassuming piece in a pale dove grey and with a smooth, silky finish. This attractive blind is practical and durable, as well as offering style and sophisti
products.productdescription: The ecowood in porcelain grey satin is a pretty yet unassuming piece in a pale dove grey and with a smooth, silky finish. This attractive blind is practical and durable, as well as offering style and sophistication to any room in the home. As for the colour? It matches everything!Give your lounge a contemporary makeover by opting for an ultra-trendy yellow and grey colour scheme. Paint one wall in a sunny yellow tone and the others in a soft white. Add the porcelain grey satin along with matching accessories, from rugs and cushions to ornaments and trinkets.

products.title: Ecowood, Driftwood Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood, driftwood fine grain - venetian blind the ecowood in driftwood fine grain is a prettily textured piece in a light, natural wood tone, and with a realistic wood look. A practical and hardwearing blind that's simple and easy to use, it will look pr
products.productdescription: The ecowood in driftwood fine grain is a prettily textured piece in a light, natural wood tone, and with a realistic wood look. A practical and hardwearing blind that's simple and easy to use, it will look pretty and natural wherever it's placed.Create a simple yet elegantly organic scheme in a dining room by including naked woods and artisan fabrics as well as the lovely driftwood fine grain. Go for stark white walls and plenty of plant-life, adding bamboo accessories to add to the look.

products.title: Ecowood, Saddle Satin - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood, saddle satin - venetian blind saddle satin is the latest addition to their celebrated ecowood range. With a gentle cream that sits gently in the background you'll have the perfect compliment to the bolder colours that really bring your home to life
products.productdescription: Saddle satin is the latest addition to their celebrated ecowood range. With a gentle cream that sits gently in the background you'll have the perfect compliment to the bolder colours that really bring your home to life. No matter what you have in mind the secret is to let your creativity run wild. Don't put limits on it; think about how you can get dark greys into the mix and how satin will allow them to take centre stage. When you strike the right balance you'll know it!

products.title: Ecowood, Antique Silver Satin - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood, antique silver satin - venetian blind the beautifully grey-toned antique silver satin, from the faux wood ecowood range, has a distinctly vintage feel to it. Smooth, with light grain detailing, it offers sleek durability as well as tons of charac
products.productdescription: The beautifully grey-toned antique silver satin, from the faux wood ecowood range, has a distinctly vintage feel to it. Smooth, with light grain detailing, it offers sleek durability as well as tons of character and aesthetic appeal.Treat your master bedroom to a pretty vintage scheme, settling the antique silver satin against dusky pink walls and furnishing the room with subtle off-whites and dove greys. Add kitsch floral patterns in coordinating tones, and be sure to include shabby chic features for extra flair.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Porcelain Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood deluxe, porcelain grey fine grain - venetian blind there's no colour with quite the versatile sophistication of grey, and the ecowood deluxe range's porcelain grey fine grain doesn't let it down. A realistic grain texture sits across the slats, wh
products.productdescription: There's no colour with quite the versatile sophistication of grey, and the ecowood deluxe range's porcelain grey fine grain doesn't let it down. A realistic grain texture sits across the slats, which offer contemporary clean lines as well as practical durability.Coordinate the porcelain grey fine grain with a rich mauve for a stunningly pretty, yet clean and contemporary, look in the guest bedroom. Depending on your tastes, accompany with bold florals or fun abstract patterning to add extra depth.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Brilliant White Satin - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood deluxe, brilliant white satin - venetian blind when you want to discover a timeless look that will add a contemporary finishing touch to any room in your home, brilliant white satin deluxe is the perfect choice for you. Sleek, crisp, and simple; e
products.productdescription: When you want to discover a timeless look that will add a contemporary finishing touch to any room in your home, brilliant white satin deluxe is the perfect choice for you. Sleek, crisp, and simple; every inch is carefully crafted to enable you to sit back and relax like never before. Transform the living room into the relaxing space you never want to leave by combining brilliant white with charcoal fabrics and a laminate wooden floor. Find the right balance between light woods and dark fabrics, and you'll see the crisp finish of white satin shine through in the background.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Absolute White Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood deluxe, absolute white fine grain - venetian blind with a chic, designer aesthetic, the ecowood deluxe's absolute white fine grain displays a snow-toned, grain-textured faux wood, formed skilfully into wide, adjustable slats. Coordinating fittings
products.productdescription: With a chic, designer aesthetic, the ecowood deluxe's absolute white fine grain displays a snow-toned, grain-textured faux wood, formed skilfully into wide, adjustable slats. Coordinating fittings feature alongside, including woven linen ladder ribbons for ultimate vogue.Craft a warm and welcoming atmosphere in the guest bedroom, placing the absolute white fine grain amidst warm peach walls and matching white furnishings. Add the occasional splash of aqua or teal for extra depth, and opt for glossy silver fittings and fixture to add fun, contemporary zeal.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Pistachio Shell Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood deluxe, pistachio shell fine grain - venetian blind with a chic, contemporary look, the ecowood deluxe's pistachio shell fine grain features a pale biscuit, grainy textured faux wood, which easily forms wide, adjustable slats built for ease and sp
products.productdescription: With a chic, contemporary look, the ecowood deluxe's pistachio shell fine grain features a pale biscuit, grainy textured faux wood, which easily forms wide, adjustable slats built for ease and speed. Matching fixtures are displayed alongside them, including designer ladder ribbons for ultimate style.Build a colourful and vibrant atmosphere in the hallway, placing the pistachio shell fine grain amidst a bold coral feature wall and white walls to compliment. Add the splashes of silver in your ornaments and fittings for extra depth and plenty of sophistication.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Penthouse Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood deluxe, penthouse fine grain - venetian blind if you love rich, biscuity cream tones, then you'll adore the penthouse fine grain from the ecowood deluxe range. Wide slats, with a grain-texture finish, are backed by linen tapes to adjust and tilt t
products.productdescription: If you love rich, biscuity cream tones, then you'll adore the penthouse fine grain from the ecowood deluxe range. Wide slats, with a grain-texture finish, are backed by linen tapes to adjust and tilt the blind, giving a coordinated and designer look.Mix the penthouse fine grain with the lush hues of coffee and chocolate for a classic cookies and cream look. Use this colour scheme to craft and unusual yet striking kitchen look, where cosiness will be the word of the day.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Blizzard Grey Satin - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood deluxe, blizzard grey satin - venetian blind every bit as luxurious as the range implies, the ecowood deluxe in blizzard grey satin has a sleek, satiny finish, joined by the palest cool grey colouring. Matching fittings, including designer-look la
products.productdescription: Every bit as luxurious as the range implies, the ecowood deluxe in blizzard grey satin has a sleek, satiny finish, joined by the palest cool grey colouring. Matching fittings, including designer-look ladder ribbons made from high quality linen, enhance this fashionable look, offering a clean and simple aesthetic that you'll love.For a stylishly chic look, pair the blizzard grey satin with a navy blue feature wall and cool white furniture. Use silver tones and matching greys as your accent colours to complete the look, which would be perfect for a home study or modern dining room.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Castle Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood deluxe, castle grey fine grain - venetian blind in true ecowood deluxe style, the range's castle grey fine grain offers true designer chic. With a satin-like feel and authentic-style grain detail, this faux wood blind is as gorgeous as it is pract
products.productdescription: In true ecowood deluxe style, the range's castle grey fine grain offers true designer chic. With a satin-like feel and authentic-style grain detail, this faux wood blind is as gorgeous as it is practical. Designer ribbons adorn the back for easy adjusting.Pair the soft grey of the castle grey fine grain with the bold and stark tone of a pure ribbon red for an unforgettable look in a contemporary dining room. Add in darker shades of grey to complete this moody and daring look.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Chic Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood deluxe, chic grey fine grain - venetian blind the ecowood deluxe in chic grey fine grain brings an air of sophistication wherever it goes - or hangs. A deep shade of grey, it displays a classic wood grain works wonderfully on its faux wood slats.
products.productdescription: The ecowood deluxe in chic grey fine grain brings an air of sophistication wherever it goes - or hangs. A deep shade of grey, it displays a classic wood grain works wonderfully on its faux wood slats. Linen ribbon tapes add a designer touch that just can't be beaten in terms of style.Opt for a bold look in your kitchen by pairing the chic grey fine grain with jet black and ruby red. Choose sleek black and grey units and worktops, adding in red in the form of utensils and crockery, and making silver your accent colour of choice.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Brilliant White Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood deluxe, brilliant white fine grain - venetian blind when you trace your eye across brilliant white fine grain deluxe you come to see how the lines gently wind their way across the surface. When you combine this with the purity of the white, you ha
products.productdescription: When you trace your eye across brilliant white fine grain deluxe you come to see how the lines gently wind their way across the surface. When you combine this with the purity of the white, you have the perfect way to add a sense of calm and balance to any room you choose. Matching is all about adding colour contrasts that bring both sides of the equation to life. Light wooden floors and dark charcoal fabrics would be inspired choices in the living room. Find the right balance by softening the lighting and letting brilliant white glow the natural way.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Chenille Satin - Venetian Blind

This streamlined piece is backed with matching, vertical ladder tapes to hold and adjust the slats, giving further cohesion and coordination.Construct a modern design scheme in your home office, painting the walls in pale baby blue and matching the carpet to the soothing chenille satin. Opt for light wooden furniture to increase the feeling of light, airy spaciousness.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Washed White Satin - Venetian Blind

products.productdescription: With a subtle finish that will please even the most discerning eye, washed white satin is the latest deluxe addition to their ever-popular ecowood range. The white is beautifully accented by the grain of the wood and the linen ladders top things off in style.Take your mind back to the relaxing setting of the coast by working in a light stained wood floor and some light blue walls. Perfect for creating the relaxing ambience that will have you switched off from the events of the day the moment you put your key in the door.

products.metadescription: Ecowood deluxe, vanilla kiss satin - venetian blind as luxurious as the range's name, the ecowood deluxe in vanilla kiss satin has all the creaminess you could wish for. With a silky smooth texture and classic yet contemporary look, this blind offers as m
products.productdescription: As luxurious as the range's name, the ecowood deluxe in vanilla kiss satin has all the creaminess you could wish for. With a silky smooth texture and classic yet contemporary look, this blind offers as much in the looks department as it does function.Compliment a plum feature wall by hanging the vanilla kiss satin directly onto the colour, toning it down and adding sophistication and depth. Remember to add coordinating ornaments and trinkets to this luxe look, which would be ideal in a master bedroom or living room.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Vanilla Kiss Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood deluxe, vanilla kiss fine grain - venetian blind as sweet and creamy as ice cream, the ecowood deluxe vanilla kiss fine grain is just that  a sweeping kiss of yellow creaminess as refreshing as summer. The pretty shade is complimented by the fine
products.productdescription: As sweet and creamy as ice cream, the ecowood deluxe vanilla kiss fine grain is just that  a sweeping kiss of yellow creaminess as refreshing as summer. The pretty shade is complimented by the fine grain texture that offers the look and feel of real wood.Surround the vanilla kiss fine grain with equally luxurious shades like rose pinks or lush lavenders for a gorgeously fresh look in a master or guest bedroom. Add in florals and stripes for extra depth.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Castle Grey Satin - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood deluxe, castle grey satin - venetian blind a classic grey shade, the castle grey satin from the ecowood deluxe range is a cool and contemporary venetian blind, carefully crafted from durable faux wood that mimics the real thing perfectly. The look
products.productdescription: A classic grey shade, the castle grey satin from the ecowood deluxe range is a cool and contemporary venetian blind, carefully crafted from durable faux wood that mimics the real thing perfectly. The look is finished off with coordinating linen ladders for easy adjustments.Grey looks good with anything, but the castle grey satin will look especially striking when used as part of a light and airy, white monochrome colour scheme, perfect for a home office or study. Go for white walls and furniture, adding in hints of grey as needed.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Blizzard Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind

products.productdescription: Build a stunning window arrangement that's both stylish and practical with the ecowood deluxe in blizzard grey fine grain. This sleek collection of quality louvres creates a contemporary venetian blind made from convincing faux wood that's both moisture-resistant and has the ability to be adapted to any surrounding.Craft a chic ambience in your bedroom by hanging the blizzard grey fine grain amidst pastel pink walls and bedlinen. Add classic ceramics for ornaments, in whites and pale greys, and opt for sophisticated gold when choosing your fixtures and fittings.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Penthouse Satin - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood deluxe, penthouse satin - venetian blind make your home feel like the penthouse with the ecowood deluxe in penthouse satin, a faux wood venetian blind offering sleek, wide slats, backed with designer ladder tapes, as well as bags of style.<br
products.productdescription: Make your home feel like the penthouse with the ecowood deluxe in penthouse satin, a faux wood venetian blind offering sleek, wide slats, backed with designer ladder tapes, as well as bags of style.The penthouse satin will team up well with rich teal tones, making the perfect pairing for a bright and cheery bathroom colour scheme. Go for classic white tiles and suite, painting a feature wall in teal and accenting with matching accessories.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Chenille Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood deluxe, chenille fine grain - venetian blind the designer look of the ecowood deluxe range simply cannot be beaten, and the pale cream chenille fine grain adds a new level of sophistication to the collection. Its classic look belies its hardwearin
products.productdescription: The designer look of the ecowood deluxe range simply cannot be beaten, and the pale cream chenille fine grain adds a new level of sophistication to the collection. Its classic look belies its hardwearing formula, as it is made from high quality, wood-look pvc for durability and water-resistance.Complement a classic brown and cream colour scheme by surrounding the chenille fine grain with chocolate browns, delicate taupes, and light oatmeals. Include plenty of cosy fabrics for an added feeling of warmth - both aesthetically and literally! This would make the perfect scheme for a small and comfortable family den.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Chic Grey Satin - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood deluxe, chic grey satin - venetian blind the plush sheen of the ecowood deluxe's chic grey satin is modest and understated, with a polished feel and a smooth finish. Matching designer ladder ribbons, as well as pelmet and bottom rail, make the loo
products.productdescription: The plush sheen of the ecowood deluxe's chic grey satin is modest and understated, with a polished feel and a smooth finish. Matching designer ladder ribbons, as well as pelmet and bottom rail, make the look whole.Craft a chic and contemporary haven in your master bedroom by blending the chic grey satin with pale, lemon yellow walls and matching grey trim. Include pretty florals featuring coordinating shades of yellow and grey, and don't forget to add plenty of luxe fabrics for extra cosiness!

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Pistachio Shell Satin - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood deluxe, pistachio shell satin - venetian blind when it comes to neutrals, there's no beating the soft grey-toned beige of the pistachio shell satin. Hailing from the ecowood deluxe range, this blind comes complete with linen backing ribbon and mat
products.productdescription: When it comes to neutrals, there's no beating the soft grey-toned beige of the pistachio shell satin. Hailing from the ecowood deluxe range, this blind comes complete with linen backing ribbon and matching coordinates for a sleek and streamline look.Tone down a rich red feature wall in your living room or dining room by adding the pistachio shell satin to the scheme. Accent with accessories and ornaments in matching cream tones and the occasional splash of red here and there.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Absolute White Satin - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood deluxe, absolute white satin - venetian blind as luxurious as its collection suggests, the ecowood deluxe in absolute white satin has a smooth, satiny finish, accompanied by a purest white colouring. Coordinating fixtures, including designer-look
products.productdescription: As luxurious as its collection suggests, the ecowood deluxe in absolute white satin has a smooth, satiny finish, accompanied by a purest white colouring. Coordinating fixtures, including designer-look linen ladder ribbons, enhance this chic look for a clean and unobstructed aesthetic.For a sleek monochrome look, couple the absolute white satin with dove grey walls and slick, black furniture. Use whites and silvers as accenting colours to finish off the look - one that would be ideal for a home office or studio space.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Saddle Satin - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood deluxe, saddle satin - venetian blind saddle satin deluxe allows you to take your decor in a new direction whilst staying true to the calm and neutral canvas that you've created for your chosen space. By sitting gently in your window it allows you
products.productdescription: Saddle satin deluxe allows you to take your decor in a new direction whilst staying true to the calm and neutral canvas that you've created for your chosen space. By sitting gently in your window it allows you to celebrate the shimmer of the light as it makes its way into your home. Turn the guest bedroom into the homely space that your family can make their own when they come to visit for the holidays. The simple and understated colour is everything you need to create a relaxing atmosphere that welcomes them in to make themselves at home.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Driftwood Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood deluxe, driftwood fine grain - venetian blind with its ash-like looks and grainy texture, the ecowood deluxe in driftwood fine grain has the authentic look and feel of real wood. The faux wood it's made of is high quality, moisture-resistant, and
products.productdescription: With its ash-like looks and grainy texture, the ecowood deluxe in driftwood fine grain has the authentic look and feel of real wood. The faux wood it's made of is high quality, moisture-resistant, and forms sleek, attractive slats, venetian style.Because wood goes with anything, the driftwood fine grain is one of the most versatile blinds around when it comes to looks. Use it with similarly toned woods in a light and airy kitchen, throwing in your favourite colour as an accent.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Country Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood deluxe, country fine grain - venetian blind gently textured to imitate genuine wood, the ecowood deluxe in country fine grain gives a quality impression of the real thing. All this despite being made from faux wood pvc, which makes it hardwearing
products.productdescription: Gently textured to imitate genuine wood, the ecowood deluxe in country fine grain gives a quality impression of the real thing. All this despite being made from faux wood pvc, which makes it hardwearing and water-resistant.Do as it says on the tin and use the country fine grain as part of a rural, country theme in the kitchen. Opt for rustic shades of terracotta, sage green, and sky blue for the tiling, and choose units in a similar light wood. Include country creams to lighten the scheme.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Chateau Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood deluxe, chateau fine grain - venetian blind plump for all-out vintage style with the ecowood deluxe range's chateau fine grain, a beautifully stained, faux wood blind offering all of the flair and functionality of a venetian. The design is formed
products.productdescription: Plump for all-out vintage style with the ecowood deluxe range's chateau fine grain, a beautifully stained, faux wood blind offering all of the flair and functionality of a venetian. The design is formed from top quality elements, with heavy duty headrails to ensure total security.Bring some authentic french styling to the master bedroom, surrounding the chateau fine grain with varying shades of cream and ivory. Wooden flooring or plush cream carpet would suit this look perfectly, and don't forget to include flowing linens and luxe trinkets to finish.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Espresso Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood deluxe, espresso fine grain - venetian blind featuring a dark brown colouring and authentic-looking wood grain, the ecowood deluxe's espresso fine grain is an attractive luxury blind. Designer-style woven ladder tapes finish off this handsome look
products.productdescription: Featuring a dark brown colouring and authentic-looking wood grain, the ecowood deluxe's espresso fine grain is an attractive luxury blind. Designer-style woven ladder tapes finish off this handsome look with streamlined chic.Team the brown of the espresso fine grain with a muted terracotta for an unusual yet striking look in a contemporary living room. Go for white walls, adorning them with funky wall prints in matching blacks and burnt oranges. Add warmth with plush throws and cushions.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Provincial Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood deluxe, provincial fine grain - venetian blind it would be simple to create an elegant dcor with the ecowood deluxe in provincial fine grain, due to its natural, honeyed tone and authentic appearance. The hardwearing and water-resistant faux wood
products.productdescription: It would be simple to create an elegant dcor with the ecowood deluxe in provincial fine grain, due to its natural, honeyed tone and authentic appearance. The hardwearing and water-resistant faux wood used to form this practical, venetian-style blind produces a pleasant window dressing that is full of hidden benefits.Showcase the provincial fine grain in your lounge with sun-kissed, lumber flooring and toned furnishings to fashion a coordinated arrangement with authentic features. Include a soothing cream or caramel background with harmonising honeyed fabrics to continue the scheme with comforting textures and corresponding colour.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Fruitwood Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood deluxe, fruitwood fine grain - venetian blind create an authentic window dressing that is long-lasting and water-resistant with the ecowood deluxe in fruitwood fine grain. This quality faux wood prevents both warping and cracking with its durable
products.productdescription: Create an authentic window dressing that is long-lasting and water-resistant with the ecowood deluxe in fruitwood fine grain. This quality faux wood prevents both warping and cracking with its durable pvc that looks and feels just like the real thing. It also features top quality components for a contemporary, modern edge, and decorative linen tapes for added designer detail.Craft a well-dressed dcor in the kitchen by including the fruitwood fine grain with walnut cabinets and coordinating lumber worktops. Form an exquisite palette with creamy walls, deeply toned furnishings, and neutrally shaded appliances for a sophisticated colour combination.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Porcelain Grey Satin - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood deluxe, porcelain grey satin - venetian blind the subtle dove grey of the porcelain grey satin, borne from the luxe ecowood deluxe range, is a refreshingly cool shade and sits on a smooth, untarnished surface across wide adjustable slats. Coordina
products.productdescription: The subtle dove grey of the porcelain grey satin, borne from the luxe ecowood deluxe range, is a refreshingly cool shade and sits on a smooth, untarnished surface across wide adjustable slats. Coordinating ladder tapes add to the designer feel.Use the porcelain grey satin as a toning accent to stronger shades, such as deep purple or rich red, in the master or guest bedroom. Paint a feature wall in your key colour, adding the blind as a way of breaking up the block colour, and coordinate accessories in matching colours.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Antique Silver Satin - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Ecowood deluxe, antique silver satin - venetian blind appropriately named, the ecowood deluxe in antique silver satin offers a pretty vintage aesthetic on a silver-toned faux wood, featuring soft grain detailing and a smooth, flawless finish. These attrac
products.productdescription: Appropriately named, the ecowood deluxe in antique silver satin offers a pretty vintage aesthetic on a silver-toned faux wood, featuring soft grain detailing and a smooth, flawless finish. These attractive slats can be adjusted with ease, for versatile light and ventilation.Embrace the antique theme of the blind and use it to create a lovely vintage look in your home office. Paint the walls in a chalky duck egg blue and accent with calming, matching greys throughout. Add fresh linens in songbird patterns to complete the scheme.
